content: meet the updated knit fast zig zag cowl pattern specifically upgraded to use spincycle s newest yarn plump plump is a 2-ply 100% american wool yarn dyed and spun in the spincycle mill in bellingham washington it s self-striping nature lends itself to patterns that show off the dramatic color shift using just 1 skein of this gorgeous yarn you can work up this cowl in one pleasant sitting you ll want to collect all the colors *errata - 5/12/23 row 9 should read *k3 yo skp k2 repeat from * to end of round
